299566.「<cs_pchero>君！\n いいところに来てくれました！: <cs_pchero>! You've come to the right place!

299567.「ご覧のとおり 地獄の門の封印が\n 解けてしまったのです。\n <cs_pch:
As you can see, the seals of the Gate of Hell
have been broken. And <cs_pchero> needs a
hand!

299568.<center><pipipi_low>ほう。また 贄が増えたか。\n己が命を:
<pipipi_low>How. Another sacrifice. It is an
auspicious mindset for a lowly species to
offer up its life as an offering.

299569.<center><pipipi_low>あの小賢しい封印が解け\n我は 今ひとた:
<pipipi_low>The clever little seal is broken,
and I am once more all-powerful.

299570.<center><pipipi_low>健気な うぬらには 褒美として\n極上の:
<pipipi_low>I will reward you with the honor
of offering me pleasure in the form of the
finest demise and the sweetest face of death.

299571.「まさか 地獄の門の……ストレザーテの声！？\n やたら 偉そうにしやがって\n:
You don't think that's the voice of Stretherte
from the Gate of Hell? What do you think
you're doing?

299572.<center><pipipi_low>未知への恐怖は 下等種の本能よな。\nよ:
<pipipi_low>Fear of the unknown is an instinct
of the lower species. Good, I'll answer that
question.

299573.<center><pipipi_low>地をはいずりまわり 踏み潰したところで\:
<pipipi_low>The ants who trample and trample
and trample, but do not care. That's what they
are to me.

299574.「どうやら 魔神族とは 記憶力に\n 問題を抱えているようですね。１０００年前\:
It seems that the demigods have a problem with
memory, remember that they were defeated by
those ants a thousand years ago?

299576.「<cs_pchero>さん！\n あなたが用意してくれた 浄化の光のおかげで\:
<cs_pchero>! I think I can use the mystic
arts thanks to the Purify Light you have
prepared for me!

299577.「あと少しだけ……少しだけ\n 準備の時間をください！ 私が かならず\n この:
Just a little more time... just a little more
time to prepare! I will surely use this magic
to annihilate the Gate of Hell...!

299578.<center><pipipi_low>……忘れてなどおらぬ。\n忘れられぬ。忘:
<pipipi_low>...I have not forgotten. I cannot
forget. How could I forget? That humiliation.
That vindictiveness. That indignation!

299579.<center><pipipi_low>ゆえに 我は 憂慮する。あの娘より感じる:
Therefore I am concerned. The faint glimmer of light that I feel from that girl... it may be a light in the wind, but it
may not be an ant's hole.

299584.<center><pipipi_low>サン！！\n絶対に お前を守る！:
<pipipi_low> San! I will protect you, I
promise!

299589.「準備の時間を かせいでもらえれば かならず！: If you give us time to prepare, we will!

299591.「聞け ガーディアンの精鋭たち！\n サンの秘術の準備がととのうまで 戦うのだ！:
Hear me, elite Guardians! You will fight until
San's mystic arts are ready!

299592.「敵の軍勢に 際限なし！\n なれど １匹たりとも 逃がしはするな！\n かなら:
The enemy's army knows no bounds! But not a
single one of them escapes! We must hold them
here!

299593.「戦えっ！！\n 世界を 人々を 共に戦う仲間を……すべてを！\n 守り抜いてみ:
Fight! Fight for the world, the people, your
comrades in arms... everything! I will protect
you, Guardian!

299594.<center><pipipi_low>よろしい。１０００年前の 過ちを正そう。:
Very well, let us right the wrongs done a thousand years ago. Never again shall we be defeated by our lower species, the
transcendent.

299595.<center><pipipi_low>ふむ……興が湧いた。\nあの日 我に挑ん:
<pipipi_low>Hmmm...that's exciting. How about
a reenactment of the lower species that
challenged me that day?

299596.<center><pipipi_low>クカ……クカカ！ なんと痛快！ これぞ悦:
Kuka...kuka! How painful! Such pleasure! Now, let the lower species that tried to kill me kill each other and enjoy me
to my heart's content!

299597.「よく あの大物を倒したな <cs_pchero>！\n けど……これじゃ キリ:
I don't know how you beat that big guy. But...
that's not enough! San's secret magic is not
ready yet...!

299598.「お待たせしました。\n これこそが 僧侶の秘術……\n 悪しき者を浄化させる:
Thank you for waiting. This is the secret art
of the priests... the spell of banishment that
purifies the wicked.

299599.「さあ 邪悪なる魂よ。\n 光の中へと 消え去りなさい……！: Come, evil souls. Disappear into the light.

299601.<center><pipipi_low>おお このヒカリ……ヒカリ ヒカリ！\n:
<pipipi_low>Oh, this hikari...hikari hikari!
I'm disappearing! I'm vanishing! My grief, my
hatred, fades away in Hikari!

299602.<center><pipipi_low>ク…クカ……クカカカカ！ 見事 見事 見:
k...kka...kka...kka! Splendid! Splendid! You have done wonders to extinguish my unlimited magic, low-born! No, daughter of
Ogre!

299603.「いいえ 私の呪文は 最後のひと押し。\n あなたを 打ち負かしたのは\n １０:
No, my spell is the final push. I have
defeated you with a thousand years of
justice...

299604.「世界を守る盾たらんと この地で戦いつづけた\n ガーディアンに……我らが １０:
The Guardian who has been fighting in this Land Room to be the shield that protects the world, you have been defeated by the fangs we
have been sharpening for 1000 Year Fangs.

299605.<center><pipipi_low>ならば誇れよ ガーディアン！\nその牙が:
<pipipi_low> Then be proud, Guardian! Your
fangs have broken me! That you have shattered
this Strezate!

299608.「……ったあ～！ 勝ったんです！\n ストレザーテに……魔神族に勝った～！:
...Oh my gosh! We won! I beat the Strezate...
the Demon Gods~!

299610.「私こそ ありがとう。\n また守ってくれたね……パパ。:
Me too. Thank you. You protected me again...
dad.

299612.「何か……勘違いをされているようですね。\n 僕に 娘は いません。:
I think you have misunderstood something. I
don't have a daughter.

299614.「そうよ ２０年も前のことですもの。\n 私のこと忘れちゃってても 仕方ないわよ:
Yes, it was 20 years ago. It's no wonder
you've forgotten all about me!

299615.「でもね 私は覚えてるの！\n ピクニックに行って 魔物に襲われたとき\n 絶対:
But I remember! When we went on the picnic and
the monsters attacked us... you said you'd
protect me!

299616.「おじいちゃんと おばあちゃんは\n ママと一緒に パパは死んだって言ったけど…:
Grandma and Grandpa told me that you and Mom
were dead... but I believed you were alive.

299617.「パパは 強い戦士だったけど\n いつもケガだらけで……今も そうかもって……\:
My father was a strong warrior, but he was
always injured... and he still is... that's
why I became a priest.

299618.「大丈夫 パパが忘れても 私が覚えてる！\n だけど……ねえ パパ。\n 私のこ:
Don't worry. Even if you forget, I'll
remember! But... hey, Dad. Did you really
forget all about me?

299620.「君のことを 忘れた日なんて\n １日も なかった……！:
There hasn't been a day that I haven't
forgotten about you.

299621.「でも……君の父と言える資格が どこにある！\n 君のお母さんは嫌がったのに 大:
But... what makes me qualified to be your father? Your mother didn't want to be a father, but you forced her to go out with you
because she was fine... and then you let her die!

299622.「こんな男に！\n 家族も守れない男に なんの資格がある……！:
What kind of man is this? What does a man who
can't even protect his family deserve...!

299624.「それに パパは たくさんの人を\n 守っていたんでしょう？ ガーディアンとして:
Besides, you protected a lot of people, didn't
you? You were protecting the world as a
Guardian!

299625.「もう 自分を……許してあげてよ。\n 私はパパのこと 少しも 恨んでないよ。\:
You have to... forgive yourself. I don't hate
you at all. I'm sure you don't either.

299626.「だから ねえ パパ……\n 私に……私のパパって呼ばせてよ……！:
So, hey, Dad... let me... call you my
Daddy...!

299628.「サン……いいのか？\n 君の そばにいても……。: San... are you sure? I'll stay with you...

299629.「さっきから\n そう言ってるじゃない……わからず屋。:
You've been saying that for a while now...you
don't know.

299630.ダンディオ団長と サンは\n離れていた時間を 埋めるように\nつもる話を 交わし:
Captain Dandio and San exchanged stories to
make up for the time they had spent apart...

299631.そして 守護騎士団のガーディアンたちは\n１０００年にわたる戦いの終焉と 親子の:
And the Guardians of the Guardians celebrated
the end of a thousand years of warfare and the
reunion of father and son...!
